General.Name: Northcoders Group PLC
General.Description: Northcoders Group PLC provides various training programs for software coding to individual, government, and corporate customers in the United Kingdom. The company provides bootcamp training courses, government-funded apprenticeships, and bespoke training courses, as well as software development solutions. It offers its courses through classroom and online teaching. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Manchester Technology Centre, Manchester, United Kingdom, M1 7ED
